creator: lucamartini@tagetik.com
text:
Currently POI library does not support some custom formats for numbers.

In particular, formats that ends with commas alter the number by dividing it for 1000^n, where n is the number of traling commas.  

We have implemented a solution that handles such cases.

In the next comment, I will provide the proposed patch
Seems to have been applied via r1800975.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
